headline: Tesla, Shell, Glencore, JIO & BlackRock: Trending Tickers
summary: Tesla (TSLA) stock tumbled during extended trading as CEO Elon Musk doubled down on his political efforts, creating the 'America Party' despite investors urging the world's richest man to focus on his companies rather than politics. This comes as Musk and US President Trump continue their public beef.  Shell (SHEL, SHEL.L) shares fall after the energy giant warned to expect weak results for gas. Glencore (GLEN.L) stock is under pressure as trade uncertainty weighs, particularly in South Africa. JIO Financial (JIOFIN.BO, JIOFIN.NS) and BlackRock (BLK) partner for a joint venture. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise here.

headline: BlackRock to Acquire ElmTree Funds
summary: NEW YORK & ST. LOUIS, July 07, 2025--BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE: BLK) announced today that it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire ElmTree Funds ("ElmTree"), a net-lease real estate investment firm with $7.3 billion in total assets under management as of March 31, 2025. Upfront consideration will be paid primarily in stock, with the potential for additional consideration subject to ElmTree performance over the next five years. Additional financial details were not disclosed.

Upfront consideration will be paid primarily in stock, with the potential for additional consideration subject to ElmTree performance over the next five years. Additional financial details were not disclosed.
